ygData.subject: Re: Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... bizarre hidden ... little Kithicor fan club.... Finally someone else notices...I get sick of those messages that say something like, We need to get rid of
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>everything Kithicor (ALWAYS a good bet for mysterious adventure, there is a
bizarre hidden
>story in that woods, over on Crossroads of Norath/Discussions we have a
little Kithicor fan club....


Finally someone else notices...I get sick of those messages that say
something like, "We need to get rid of useless zones....like Kithicor"

I adventured there for more than a few levels, and I still get a kick out of
that dark place...Have you ever met Kithicor himself? I saw him once by the
cabin with the grizzley bears and the flag. He didn't say much...

Ryndal
Level 18 Bard
Cazic-Thule
